entry.title: Obesity of Politicians and Corruption in Post‐Soviet Countries

link.title: Obesity of Politicians and Corruption in Post‐Soviet Countries

entry.content:
Post 188020 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: This is a pretty creepy kind of thesis. Obesity is a complicated subject, fat people are already subject to discrimination in daily life over lazy stereotypes, we don't need to give air to this kind of thing. -- LobsterMitten
entry.summary: Post 188020 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: This is a pretty creepy kind of thesis. Obesity is a complicated subject, fat people are already subject to discrimination in daily life over lazy stereotypes, we don't need to give air to this kind of thing. -- LobsterMitten
